quoteText: If we make a material change to the Contract, we will provide Customer with reasonable notice prior to the change taking effect, either by emailing the email address associated with Customerâ€™s account or by messaging Customer through the Services.
title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
